Posts.Content: Hi , during my 2nd round of fec chemo I had a reaction to the epirubicin- bp dropped, sweaty and calmmy and generally felt unwell. Apparently this can happen , but I cant find ant information to coroborate thsi . Also all chemo stopped until next cycle so anxious I am missing treatment, but despite asking no expalnation provided. Can anyone advise or had the same experience thanks
Posts.Title: reaction to Epirubicin on 2nd chemo
